org.apache.ignite.ml.environment.parallelism

Interface ParallelismStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultParallelismStrategy, NoParallelismStrategy

    public interface ParallelismStrategy
    Specifies the behaviour of processes in ML-algorithms that can may be parallelized such as parallel learning in bagging, learning submodels for One-vs-All model, Cross-Validation etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ParallelismStrategy.Type
      The type of parallelism.

    • Field Summary

      On default pool.
